### Announcement of a Government Tender Opportunity
#### Dental Services at Springhill Institution

#### Opportunity Summary

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), Atlantic Region, is inviting qualified suppliers to provide dental services to inmates at Springhill Institution in Springhill, Nova Scotia.

#### Request for Proposal (RFP)

A Request for Proposal (RFP) is being issued for the provision of dental services to inmates at Springhill Institution. The successful supplier will provide essential dental services, including examination, diagnosis, treatment, and follow-up care. The supplier must also coordinate services with external dental specialists and obtain necessary approvals and documentation.

#### Key Requirements

* Provide and coordinate essential dental services to inmates in accordance with the National Essential Health Services Framework
* Prepare dental clinic lists and appointment schedules
* Manage all aspects of dental care services, including coordination of care provided by dental specialists
* Document dental assessment, treatment, and consultations in the inmate’s Dental Record Folder
* Consult with the Chief Health Services regarding requirements for dental supplies and equipment
* Provide a Dental Assistant and backup personnel to ensure continuity of services

#### Additional Information

* The contract period is from April 1st, 2023, to March 31st, 2025
* The estimated quantity of commodity is not specified in the solicitation document
* The solicitation document and associated documents can be downloaded from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders
* Bidders can submit their proposals in either official language of Canada (English or French)
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Sylvie Gallant, Contracting Authority, at (506) 378-8724 or sylvie.gallant@csc-scc.gc.ca.

#### Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC)

PAC offers seminars to businesses interested in learning how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada. Please visit Buyandsell.gc.ca for more information. [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/) 

**Note:**

* The original document contains a longer statement of work and evaluation criteria, which are available upon request.
* The procurement is not subject to any trade agreement, Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement, or set-aside for Indigenous Suppliers.
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders)
